title: Scout Youth Academy Player
description: A scout needs to analyze a promising youth academy player's performance data and game footage to determine if they should be offered a professional contract.

tasks.description: Retrieve the player's performance statistics from the last two seasons.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls a report showing the player's goals, assists, and physical metrics.

tasks.description: Analyze video footage from their last five games to assess technical skills and decision-making.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies key strengths (e.g., dribbling) and weaknesses (e.g., defensive positioning).

tasks.description: Generate a comprehensive scouting report with a recommendation to offer a 3-year contract.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a detailed report summarizing findings and providing a clear recommendation.
